yes, that sounds good. We'll need to submit the corrected one by December 6th.
But first, I was thinking about the  structure, and probably a good idea would be to research the API first and choose at least main ones we'll be using.  So our structure would match the picked API structure and we wouldn't have to manually adapt it later. if you understand what I'm trying to explain here)) cause sometimes it's challenging.
